signup-next-step-confirm: We just sent an email to confirm your subscription. Click the button in the email and you’ll be ready to go.
signup-confirm-subscription: Confirm your subscription to Pocket’s newsletter
signup-one-click-away: You’re one click away from fascinating reads.
signup-email-preferences: You are receiving this email because you signed up for Pocket. To update your email preferences click <1>here</1>.
signup-check-inbox: Check your inbox every weekday for story recommendations from across the web.
signup-article-recommend: In the meantime, check out some of the most popular English-language articles we recommend.
signup-return-to-subscribe: You can still subscribe to Pocket’s weekday newsletter of fascinating reads. Click <1>here</1> to return to the newsletter sign up page.
